body.content:
My beloved, i can see that you are really God fearing and that have given me the reason to see a better tomorrow of your great prayer.I have made a twist to get the majoy of my fund transferred this time not as a loan but willed.As you carry on this great project the good God will see you through in all your endeavor I was briefed by the Doctor that i have limited time on earth, so please pray for my ill health and i want my fund to help in long way, so that my soul will be pleased.Mind you will be having percentage of 40% the fund to yourself and 60%please see that you make good use of it to the charity in your location by putting smile on peoples faces.Am trusting the sum of $19,250,000.00.
My beloved due to my inability to make move i will refer you to my Financial Adviser in whom you are to make communication as regards to this fund transfer to your account.Here is the information as below:
Name...................... Barrister Fransisco Tapia S
Email address............ barr_federick_william1122@hotmail.com





Hello,
how can I help you with this?

Gerard
